Class LocalQueryOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LocalQueryOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds local query optimization methods
    Author:
    Juraj

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueries(java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries, GlobalQuery globalQuery, GlobalSchema globalSchema)
      Entry point method for optimization; starts the optimization process
      private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueriesByJoinColumns(GlobalQuery globalQuery, java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries)
      Projection is added for columns that are mentioned in global joins
      private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueriesByLocalJoins(GlobalQuery globalQuery, java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries, GlobalSchema globalSchema)
      Joins that reference tables of the same schema are pushed down the query tree to be executed locally
      private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueriesBySelectColumns(java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries, GlobalSelectQuery globalSelectQuery)
      Projections are added by a global select clause to minimize network traffic when receiving local results
      private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueryByWhereColumns(GlobalQuery globalQuery, java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries)
      Projection is added for columns that are mentioned in the global WHERE clause

      • optimizeLocalQueries

        public static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueries(java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries,
                                                                    GlobalQuery globalQuery,
                                                                    GlobalSchema globalSchema)
        Entry point method for optimization; starts the optimization process
        Parameters:
        localQueries - List of local select queries
        globalQuery - Global query that was localized
        globalSchema - Current global schema
        Returns:
        List of optimal local select queries

      • optimizeLocalQueriesByLocalJoins

        private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueriesByLocalJoins(GlobalQuery globalQuery,
                                                                                 java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries,
                                                                                 GlobalSchema globalSchema)
        Joins that reference tables of the same schema are pushed down the query tree to be executed locally
        Parameters:
        globalQuery - Global query
        localQueries - List of local select queries
        globalSchema - Current global schema
        Returns:
        List of optimized local select queries

      • optimizeLocalQueriesBySelectColumns

        private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueriesBySelectColumns(java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries,
                                                                                    GlobalSelectQuery globalSelectQuery)
        Projections are added by a global select clause to minimize network traffic when receiving local results
        Parameters:
        localQueries - Local select queries
        globalSelectQuery - Global select query
        Returns:
        List of optimized local select queries

      • optimizeLocalQueriesByJoinColumns

        private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueriesByJoinColumns(GlobalQuery globalQuery,
                                                                                  java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> localQueries)
        Projection is added for columns that are mentioned in global joins
        Parameters:
        globalQuery - Global query
        localQueries - Local select queries
        Returns:

        private static java.util.List<LocalSelectQuery> optimizeLocalQueryByWhereColumns(GlobalQuery globalQuery,
